The template file is a combination of HTML code and groovy code blocks. The usage of eXo IDE gives the possibility to create and edit those files in editor.

h1. Creation and editing templates

To create new groovy template, click on _Toolbar_ *"New->Groovy Template"* button or select *"File->New->Groovy Template"* in top menu. The editor will open new empty file; add content there and the code will be highlighted. Save file using "Save As" in "File" on top menu or _Toolbar_ button. With groovy template file _Outline Panel_ and autocomplete, but only in HTML tags by now, can be used.

h1. View properties

To view properties of the groovy template click "Show Properties" button on the right corner of the _Toolbar_.
